description: yeehaa is an ecosystem architect with a PhD in Philosophy, blending academia and tech expertise. As an entrepreneur, thinker, and coder, he's dedicated to transforming education and knowledge sharing. He founded Offcourse and created the Superconnectors event format, advocating for an impactful and inclusive internet. Based in Taipei, yeehaa focuses on uniting people around common values and translating shared visions into effective ecosystems. His work spans diverse topics, from exploring the evolution of "ecosystem" concepts to discussing internet fragmentation, decentralization, and innovative approaches to global challenges. yeehaa's courses cover breaking down silos, ecosystem grooming, preserving web diversity, practicing innovation, open sharing, and valuing differences.
blurb: yeehaa: ecosystem architect, PhD, entrepreneur, and advocate for transformative education and inclusive internet. Blends philosophy, tech, and innovation to create impactful ecosystems and foster collaborative knowledge sharing.
